hero.description: Astar unlocks blockchain, enabling unparalleled cross-layer scaling & driving web3’s mass adoption.

welcome.title: Welcome to Astar Network!
welcome.description: Astar, Japan’s leading blockchain, supports EVM, Substrate, WebAssembly (Wasm) and ink! environments to provide a scalable, cross-layer & cross-machine protocol at the bleeding edge of innovation and interoperability. Our unique Build2Earn mechanism empowers developers, allowing them to earn incentives for building the decentralized future.

collator.description: Run a node to support the blockchain.

tokenomics.description: ASTR governance, incentives and features that unlock Web3.

ecosystem.title: Explore the ecosystem
ecosystem.description: Join our ecosystem and understand the power of Astar Network.

multichain.title: Multichain Smart Contracts
multichain.description: Astar runs in concert with Ethereum, Polkadot, Cosmos, and more; allowing for the free flow of assets and communications between multiple ecosystems.

build2earn.title: Build2Earn
build2earn.description: The basic income for developers! Astar pioneered Build2Earn to support builders and expand the developer community. Start building our ecosystem to receive ASTR rewards through our dApp staking mechanism.

web2_web3.title: Web2 + Web3
web2_web3.description: Astar Network supports tools and languages that software developers often work with already, and our multichain-native Wasm + EVM runtime environments provide ultimate freedom and flexibility to build uniquely innovative solutions that simply can't be replicated on any other platform.

global.title: Don't miss a beat.
